introduction: This video is an episode of the Autodesk Digital Builder podcast, where Eric Thomas interviews Tanya Custus, Director of AI Research at Autodesk. They discuss the impact of artificial intelligence and machine learning on construction, the importance of using these tools as collaborators rather than replacements, and the risks and challenges associated with their implementation.

sections.title: Section 1: Introduction to AI and Machine Learning
content: Explanation of the acronym AI and its role in construction.
Discussion on the importance of understanding the difference between AI and machine learning.
Examples of how AI and machine learning are being applied in the construction industry.
Overview of the potential benefits and challenges of using AI and machine learning in construction.

sections.title: Section 2: Real Risks and Challenges of AI in Construction
content: Discussion on the risks associated with introducing AI technology in construction.
Examples of how AI can make mistakes and the consequences of these mistakes.
Explanation of the importance of using AI as a collaborator rather than a replacement.
Overview of the challenges faced by teams developing AI tools for construction.
topics: Challenges of AI Development in Construction

sections.title: Section 3: AI and Cloud Computing in Construction
content: Explanation of the importance of collocating data and compute in cloud computing.
Discussion on how the size of models has become useful and human-like.
Examples of how AI is being used to improve construction workflows and save time.
Overview of the potential future developments in AI and cloud computing for construction.
topics: Data and Compute in Cloud Computing
Future Developments in AI and Cloud Computing

sections.title: Section 4: AI and Design Workflows in Construction
content: Explanation of the importance of using AI as a design collaborator.
Discussion on the challenges of integrating AI into design workflows.
Examples of how AI is being used to improve design collaboration and trust.
Overview of the potential future developments in AI and design workflows in construction.
topics: Challenges of AI Integration in Design Workflows
AI Improving Design Collaboration and Trust
Future Developments in AI and Design Workflows

sections.title: Section 5: AI and Data Strategy in Construction
content: Explanation of the importance of focusing on a data strategy in construction.
Discussion on the challenges of boiling the ocean with entire data strategies.
Examples of how AI is being used to automate data strategies in construction.
Overview of the potential future developments in AI and data strategy in construction.
topics: Challenges of Boiling the Ocean with Data Strategies
AI Automating Data Strategies in Construction
Future Developments in AI and Data Strategy
Challenges of AI Integration in Design Workflows
AI Automating Data Strategies in Construction
Future Developments in AI and Cloud Computing
Future Developments in AI and Design Workflows
